description.value:
You energize the targetâ€™s natural healing. For 5 rounds, the target gains @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.universal-creature-rules.Item.sx0fNowqUsMO2YcX]{Fast Healing} and electricity resistance based on the spell slot used to cast the spell. If the target is a plant, the spell instead lasts for 1d6+4 rounds, and the spell removes one condition affecting the target that could be ended with @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.tzBzAK2mkdtaTRXw]{Remove Condition, Lesser}. Casting this spell drains all charges from a fully charged battery, otherwise it fails.

2nd: The spell grants fast healing 2 and electricity resistance 5, and drains a standard battery.

4th: The spell grants fast healing 4 and electricity resistance 10, and drains a high-capacity battery. The spell can end one condition affecting a plant target as though it were @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.wMBxnYkNbzWJklIB]{Remove Condition}.

6th: The spell grants fast healing 6 and electricity resistance 15, and drains an ultra-capacity battery. The spell can end one condition affecting a plant target as though it were @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.7BFGmL14AeT9SrA6]{Remove Condition, Greater}.

duration.value: instantaneous and up to 1 minute (see below)

target.value: one creature with a biotech, cybernetic, or magitech augmentation
